label: Criteria
comment: A specific rule or criterion within a standard or regulation. eg a carbon intensity calculation rule within an emissions standard.

datatypeProperties.comment: A unique identifier (URI) assigned to the product passport. May be a UUID
The name of the organization or company, represented as a text string.  SHOULD match the registered name in the identifeir scheme. Eg PYX Industries Pty Ltd
A conformity threshold defined by the specification (eg minimum compressive strength)

referencedBy.comment: The specification against which the assessment is made.
